author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
Migration of HLT to stage-2 L1T (80X)
Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/13701
Same caveats as posted there apply, and in addition this PR would need prior integration of
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/13558 # HLTrigger/Egamma RecoEgamma/EgammaHLTProducers
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/13572 # stage-2 L1 for muon modules
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/13596 # Hcal Iso Track migration
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/13621 # HLTL1TSeed extra SaveTags removal and fillDescriptions update
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/13702 # HLTL1TSeed update 80X
(these 5 PRs are NOT included here - but they are now integrated in 80X).
title: Migration of HLT to stage-2 L1T (80X)
